name: Chaos Drake
text_description: The unpredictable Chaos Drake wreaks havoc on the battlefield. Every time it attacks, it has a 25% chance to double its attack power.
illustration_description: A massive, fiery dragon mid-roar, with wild, chaotic energy swirling around it. Its wings are spread wide, and its eyes shimmer with a menacing red glow. The background is a stormy, dark sky with occasional lightning.
